channel.title: virus on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in virus on funPlantGenes

item.title: AcTPR2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ach25g228601.2-TA Gene Symbol: AcTPR2 Gene Name: TOPLESS-RELATED 2 Genome: (Ach25g228601.

item.title: AGO2a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc02g069260 Gene Symbol: AGO2a Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: AGO2a but not AGO2b mediates antiviral defense against infection of wild-type cucumber mosaic virus in tomato.

item.title: AGO2b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc02g069270 Gene Symbol: AGO2b Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: AGO2a but not AGO2b mediates antiviral defense against infection of wild-type cucumber mosaic virus in tomato.

item.title: BcNAC056
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BcNAC056 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Brassica rapa Functional Descriptions: BcNAC056-GFP was located in the nucleus at the subcellular level, and BcNAC056 was responsive to leaf senescence and different hormones at the transcriptional level.

item.title: BrCCA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bra004503 Gene Symbol: BrCCA1 Gene Name: CIRCADIAN AND CLOCK ASSOCIATED 1 Genome: Species: Brassica rapa Functional Descriptions: Vernalization-mediated demethylation of BrCKA2 (casein kinase II α-subunit) and BrCKB4 (casein kinase II β-subunit) shorten the period of the clock gene BrCCA1 (circadian clock associated 1) in Brassica rapa.

item.title: BrMAPK15
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bra003834 Gene Symbol: BrMAPK15 Gene Name: Mitogen-Activated Protein Kinase 15 Genome: Brassica database (http://brassicadb.

item.title: CaAIL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ca12g04370 Gene Symbol: CaAIL1 Gene Name: AP2 transcription factor 1 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaAIL1 Acts Positively in Pepper Immunity against Ralstonia solanacearum by Repressing Negative Regulators.

item.title: CaC3H14
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaC3H14 Gene Name: zinc finger CCCH domain-containing protein 14 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaC3H14 encoding a tandem CCCH zinc finger protein is directly targeted by CaWRKY40 and positively regulates the response of pepper to inoculation by Ralstonia solanacearum.

item.title: CaCKR5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CA02g17820 Gene Symbol: CaCKR5 Gene Name: cysteine-rich receptor-like protein kinase Genome: cultivar CM334 genome Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: A cysteine-rich receptor-like protein kinase CaCKR5 modulates immune response against Ralstonia solanacearum infection in pepper.

item.title: CaERF28
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Capana02g000700 Gene Symbol: CaERF28 Gene Name: ethylene-responsive factor 28 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: A single transcript CRISPR/Cas9 mediated mutagenesis of CaERF28 confers anthracnose resistance in chilli pepper.

item.title: CaHsp26.5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaHsp26.5 Gene Name: HEAT SHOCK PROTEIN 26.

item.title: CaLecRK-S.5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CA04g04250 Gene Symbol: CaLecRK-S.5 Gene Name: lectin receptor kinase Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaLecRK-S.

item.title: CaLOX2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Capana03g000103 Gene Symbol: CaLOX2 Gene Name: lipoxygenase 2 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Involvement of sweet pepper CaLOX2 in jasmonate-dependent induced defence against Western flower thrips.

item.title: CaMYB12-like
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ca05g18430 Gene Symbol: CaMYB12-like Gene Name: Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaMYB12-like underlies a major QTL for flavonoid content in pepper (Capsicum annuum) fruit.

item.title: Capana10g000198
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Capana10g000198 Gene Symbol: Capana10g000198 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Gene expression and structure variation analyses indicate the Capana10g000198, encoding a R2R3-MYB transcription factor, is the best candidate gene for the msc-3 locus.

item.title: CaPMEI1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaPMEI1 Gene Name: pectin methlyesterase inhibitor protein 1 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Pepper pectin methylesterase inhibitor protein CaPMEI1 is required for antifungal activity, basal disease resistance and abiotic stress tolerance.

item.title: CaWRKY1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaWRKY1 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor1 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Capsicum annuum WRKY protein CaWRKY1 is a negative regulator of pathogen defense.

item.title: CaWRKY6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaWRKY6 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 6 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaWRKY6 transcriptionally activates CaWRKY40, regulates Ralstonia solanacearum resistance, and confers high-temperature and high-humidity tolerance in pepper.

item.title: CcOMT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CZG_jg17822 Gene Symbol: CcOMT1 Gene Name: O-methyltransferase Genome: Species: Citrus reticulata Functional Descriptions: Using multi-omics resources, we discover a putative caffeic acid O-methyltransferase (CcOMT1) that can transfer a methyl group to the 3-hydroxyl of natsudaidain to form 3,5,6,7,8,3’,4’-heptamethoxyflavone (HPMF).

item.title: Cm-eIF4E
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Cm-eIF4E Gene Name: eukaryotic translation initiation factor 4E Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: Melon RNA interference (RNAi) lines silenced for Cm-eIF4E show broad virus resistance.

item.title: CmVPS41
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MELO3C004827 Gene Symbol: CmVPS41 Gene Name: acuolar protein sorting 41 Genome: Melonomics.

item.title: CsbHLH1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa7G071650 Gene Symbol: CsbHLH1 Gene Name: Transcription factor BHLH1 Genome: Cucurbit Genomics Database Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Virus-induced gene silencing analysis revealed that CsHOMEOBOX3 (CsHOX3) and CsbHLH1 are involved in nonglandular trichome elongation and glandular trichome formation, respectively, which corresponds with the transcriptome data.

item.title: CsCCoAOMT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs8g05410 Gene Symbol: CsCCoAOMT1 Gene Name: caffeoyl-CoA O-methyltransferase 1 Genome: Citrus sinensis reference genome Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: A multifunctional true caffeoyl coenzyme A O-methyltransferase (CsCCoAOMT1) enzyme participates in the biosynthesis of polymethoxylated flavones in citrus.

item.title: CsCER1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa6G079750 Gene Symbol: CsCER1 Gene Name: ECERIFERUM1 Genome: Cucurbit Genomics Database Species: Camelina sativa Functional Descriptions: We identified 67 GT development–related genes, the functions of 7 of which were validated by virus-induced gene silencing.

item.title: CsHOX3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa1G031750 Gene Symbol: CsHOX3 Gene Name: CsHOMEOBOX3 Genome: Cucurbit Genomics Database Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Virus-induced gene silencing analysis revealed that CsHOMEOBOX3 (CsHOX3) and CsbHLH1 are involved in nonglandular trichome elongation and glandular trichome formation, respectively, which corresponds with the transcriptome data.

item.title: CsRDR1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsRDR1a Gene Name: RNA-dependent RNA polymerase 1a Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: The expression of all four CsRDR1 genes was induced by virus infection, after which the expression level of CsRDR1b increased 10–20-fold in several virus-resistant cucumber cultivars and in a broad virus-resistant transgenic cucumber line expressing a high level of transgene small RNAs, all without alteration in salicylic acid (SA) levels.

item.title: CsRDR1b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsRDR1b Gene Name: RNA-dependent RNA polymerase 1b Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: The expression of all four CsRDR1 genes was induced by virus infection, after which the expression level of CsRDR1b increased 10–20-fold in several virus-resistant cucumber cultivars and in a broad virus-resistant transgenic cucumber line expressing a high level of transgene small RNAs, all without alteration in salicylic acid (SA) levels.

item.title: CsRDR1c1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsRDR1c1 Gene Name: RNA-dependent RNA polymerase 1c Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: The expression of all four CsRDR1 genes was induced by virus infection, after which the expression level of CsRDR1b increased 10–20-fold in several virus-resistant cucumber cultivars and in a broad virus-resistant transgenic cucumber line expressing a high level of transgene small RNAs, all without alteration in salicylic acid (SA) levels.

item.title: CsRDR1c2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsRDR1c2 Gene Name: RNA-dependent RNA polymerase 1c2 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: The expression of all four CsRDR1 genes was induced by virus infection, after which the expression level of CsRDR1b increased 10–20-fold in several virus-resistant cucumber cultivars and in a broad virus-resistant transgenic cucumber line expressing a high level of transgene small RNAs, all without alteration in salicylic acid (SA) levels.

item.title: FaOMT
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FaOMT Gene Name: O-methyltransferase Genome: Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: It is methylated further by FaOMT (Fragaria×ananassa O-methyltransferase) to 2,5-dimethyl-4-methoxy-3(2H)-furanone (DMMF) during the ripening process.

item.title: FaRIPK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FaRIPK1 Gene Name: red-initial protein kinase1 Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Descriptions: Silencing FaRIPK1 expression by VIGS affects ripening-related processes and corresponding gene expression.

item.title: FcWRKY40
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FcWRKY40 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 40 Genome: Species: Citrus japonic Functional Descriptions: The transcription factor FcWRKY40 of Fortunella crassifolia functions positively in salt tolerance through modulation of ion homeostasis and proline biosynthesis by directly regulating SOS2 and P5CS1 homologs.

item.title: FvePHP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_1g25470 Gene Symbol: FvePHP Gene Name: Genome: F.

item.title: GhADF6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GH_A09G0773 Gene Symbol: GhADF6 Gene Name: actin depolymerizing factor 6 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: GhADF6-mediated actin reorganization is associated with defence against Verticillium dahliae infection in cotton.

item.title: GhADF6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GH_D09G0714 Gene Symbol: GhADF6 Gene Name: actin depolymerizing factor 6 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: GhADF6-mediated actin reorganization is associated with defence against Verticillium dahliae infection in cotton.

item.title: GhAPL
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D02G0291 Gene Symbol: GhAPL Gene Name: Genome: CottonFGD(https://www.

item.title: GhCDPK28-A10
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A10G086300 Gene Symbol: GhCDPK28-A10 Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhCKX14
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GH_D01G1177 Gene Symbol: GhCKX14 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhCKX14 responding to drought stress by modulating antioxi-dative enzyme activity in Gossypium hirsutum compared to CKX family genes.

item.title: GhCNX6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D09G2402.1 Gene Symbol: GhCNX6 Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhCPK33
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A01G0621 Gene Symbol: GhCPK33 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhCPK33 Negatively Regulates Defense against Verticillium dahliae by Phosphorylating GhOPR3.

item.title: GhCPK33
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A04G0148 Gene Symbol: GhCPK33 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhCPK33 Negatively Regulates Defense against Verticillium dahliae by Phosphorylating GhOPR3.

item.title: GhCPK33
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A13G1164 Gene Symbol: GhCPK33 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhCPK33 Negatively Regulates Defense against Verticillium dahliae by Phosphorylating GhOPR3.

item.title: GhCPK33
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D01G2360 Gene Symbol: GhCPK33 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhCPK33 Negatively Regulates Defense against Verticillium dahliae by Phosphorylating GhOPR3.

item.title: GhCPK33
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D05G3567 Gene Symbol: GhCPK33 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhCPK33 Negatively Regulates Defense against Verticillium dahliae by Phosphorylating GhOPR3.

item.title: GhCPK33
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D13G1455 Gene Symbol: GhCPK33 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhCPK33 Negatively Regulates Defense against Verticillium dahliae by Phosphorylating GhOPR3.

item.title: GhERF105
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GH_A12G2166 Gene Symbol: GhERF105 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Silencing of GhERF105 reduced gland formation and gossypol biosynthesis.

item.title: GhHAK5aA
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A01G1516 Gene Symbol: GhHAK5aA Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The Cotton High-Affinity K+ Transporter, GhHAK5a, Is Essential for Shoot Regulation of K+ Uptake in Root under Potassium Deficiency.

item.title: GhHAK5aD
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D01G1760 Gene Symbol: GhHAK5aD Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The Cotton High-Affinity K+ Transporter, GhHAK5a, Is Essential for Shoot Regulation of K+ Uptake in Root under Potassium Deficiency.

item.title: GhLAC4-3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GH_D04G1418 Gene Symbol: GhLAC4-3 Gene Name: Genome: M-1 reference genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: These results suggest that GhLAC4-3 might enhance aphid resistance by regulating lignin biosynthesis in cotton.

item.title: GhLYI
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D08G0312 Gene Symbol: GhLYI Gene Name: LINT YIELD INCREASING Genome: eference genome of G.

item.title: GhMLP28
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhMLP28 Gene Name: Major Latex Protein 28 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton Major Latex Protein 28 (GhMLP28) Functions as a Positive Regulator of the Ethylene Responsive Factor 6 (GhERF6) in Defense against Verticillium dahliae.

item.title: GhMPK20
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhMPK20 Gene Name: mitogen-activated protein kinase 20 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The cotton MAPK kinase GhMPK20 negatively regulates resistance to Fusarium oxysporum by mediating the MKK4–MPK20–WRKY40 cascade.

item.title: GhSAG20
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A06G1407 Gene Symbol: GhSAG20 Gene Name: Genome: reference genome of G.

item.title: GhSDG51
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GH_D06G2123 Gene Symbol: GhSDG51 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Genome-wide analysis of SET domain genes and the function of GhSDG51 during salt stress in upland cotton.

item.title: GmERF3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmERF3 Gene Name: EREBP/AP2 transcription factor Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of the soybean GmERF3 gene, an AP2/ERF type transcription factor for increased tolerances to salt, drought, and diseases in transgenic tobacco.

item.title: GmHZ1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmHZ1 Gene Name: HDZip I protein Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmHZ1 was characterized by the presence of a homeodomain (HD) with a closely linked leucine zipper motif (Zip).

item.title: GmPAP2.1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma06g028100 Gene Symbol: GmPAP2.1 Gene Name: purple acid phosphatase Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of purple acid phosphatase GmPAP2.

item.title: GmRIN4a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma03g19920 Gene Symbol: GmRIN4a Gene Name: RPM1-interacting 4 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmRIN4 protein family members function nonredundantly in soybean race-specific resistance against Pseudomonas syringae.

item.title: GmRIN4b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma16g12160 Gene Symbol: GmRIN4b Gene Name: RPM1-interacting 4 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Using virus-induced gene silencing, we show that only GmRIN4a and b are required for Rpg1-b-mediated resistance.

item.title: GmRPA3a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma19g38100 Gene Symbol: GmRPA3a Gene Name: Replication Protein A subunit 3 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Replication protein A subunit 3 and the iron efficiency response in soybean.

item.title: GmRPA3b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma03g35460 Gene Symbol: GmRPA3b Gene Name: Replication Protein A subunit 3 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Replication protein A subunit 3 and the iron efficiency response in soybean.

item.title: GmRPA3c
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma20g24590 Gene Symbol: GmRPA3c Gene Name: Replication Protein A subunit 3 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Replication protein A subunit 3 and the iron efficiency response in soybean.

item.title: GmRPA3d
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma10g42530 Gene Symbol: GmRPA3d Gene Name: Replication Protein A subunit 3 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Replication protein A subunit 3 and the iron efficiency response in soybean.

item.title: GoSPGF
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GH_D08G1984 Gene Symbol: GoSPGF Gene Name: Gossypium STEM PIGMENT GLAND FORMING GENE Genome: TM-1 reference genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The discovery of the novel stem pigment gland-forming gene GoSPGF by map-based cloning.

item.title: GoSTR
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GH_D08G0109 Gene Symbol: GoSTR Gene Name: Gossypium Stem Trichome Repressor Genome: TM-1 reference genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GoSTR, a negative modulator of stem trichome formation in cotton.

item.title: HvAKT2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvAKT2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of HvAKT2 and HvHAK1 enhanced K+ uptake and H+ homoeostasis leading to drought tolerance in these transgenic lines.

item.title: HvEXPB7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvEXPB7 Gene Name: β-expansin gene Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: HvEXPB7, a novel β-expansin gene revealed by the root hair transcriptome of Tibetan wild barley, improves root hair growth under drought stress.

item.title: HvHAK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvHAK1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of HvAKT2 and HvHAK1 enhanced K+ uptake and H+ homoeostasis leading to drought tolerance in these transgenic lines.

item.title: HvMPK4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvMPK4 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: HvMPK4 phosphorylates HvWRKY1 to enhance its suppression of barley immunity to powdery mildew fungus.

item.title: HvPDS
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: HORVU4Hr1G077450 Gene Symbol: HvPDS Gene Name: Genome: barley cultivar Morex V1 Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: Our previous study reported that knockdown of the barley phytoene desaturase gene HvPDS by virus-induced gene silencing resulted in a photobleaching phenotype in seedlings Agrobacterium-mediated transformation was performed on microspore-derived callus to target the HvPDS gene, and T0 albinos with targeted mutations were successfully obtained from commercial varieties.

item.title: HvWIN1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvWIN1 Gene Name: WAX INDUCER1 Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: WAX INDUCER1 (HvWIN1) transcription factor regulates free fatty acid biosynthetic genes to reinforce cuticle to resist Fusarium head blight in barley spikelets.

item.title: LaTRE1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Lalb_Chr05g0223881 Gene Symbol: LaTRE1 Gene Name: TREHALASE1 Genome: Species: Lupinus albus Functional Descriptions: Under P deficiency, validamycin A treatment, which inhibits trehalase, led to the accumulation of trehalose and promoted the formation of CR with enhanced organic acid production, whereas overexpression of the white lupin TREHALASE1 (LaTRE1) led to decreased trehalose levels, lateral rootlet density, and organic acid production.

item.title: LeHB-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc02g086930.3.1 Gene Symbol: LeHB-1 Gene Name: Homeobox-leucine zipper protein Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: A tomato HD-Zip homeobox protein, LeHB-1, plays an important role in floral organogenesis and ripening.

item.title: LeHT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeHT1 Gene Name: hexose transporter 1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Involvement of the Hexose Transporter Gene LeHT1 and of Sugars in Resistance of Tomato to Tomato Yellow Leaf Curl Virus.

item.title: LrABCF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LrABCF1 Gene Name: ATP-binding cassette transporter1 Genome: Species: Lilium regale Functional Descriptions: LrABCF1, a GCN-type ATP-binding cassette transporter from Lilium regale, is involved in defense responses against viral and fungal pathogens.

item.title: LrNAC35
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Unigene0012070 Gene Symbol: LrNAC35 Gene Name: NAC domain-containing protein 35-like Genome: Species: Lilium regale Functional Descriptions: Ectopic overexpression of LrNAC35 alters flowering time in petunia.

item.title: LsWRKY70
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LsWRKY70 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Lactuca sativa Functional Descriptions: GA signaling protein LsRGL1 interacts with the abscisic acid signaling-related gene LsWRKY70 to affect the bolting of leaf lettuce.

item.title: MdSQS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdSQS1 Gene Name: squalene synthase 1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Virus-induced gene silencing of the two squalene synthase isoforms of apple tree (Malus × domestica L.

item.title: MdSQS2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdSQS2 Gene Name: squalene synthase 2 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Virus-induced gene silencing of the two squalene synthase isoforms of apple tree (Malus × domestica L.

item.title: MeTT8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Manes.01G208400 Gene Symbol: MeTT8 Gene Name: Genome: Manihot esculenta, v6.

item.title: NaMKK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NaMKK1 Gene Name: mitogen-activated protein kinase kinase 1 Genome: Species: Nicotiana attenuata Functional Descriptions: Two mitogen-activated protein kinase kinases, MKK1 and MEK2, are involved in wounding- and specialist lepidopteran herbivore Manduca sexta-induced responses in Nicotiana attenuata.

item.title: NaWRKY70
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NaWRKY70 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 70 Genome: Species: Nicotiana attenuata Functional Descriptions: NaWRKY70 is a key regulator of Nicotiana attenuata resistance to Alternaria alternata through regulation of phytohormones and phytoalexins biosynthesis.

item.title: NbALD1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Niben101Scf04547g02001.1 Gene Symbol: NbALD1 Gene Name: AGD2-LIKE DEFENCE RESPONSE PROTEIN 1 Genome: Nicotiana benthamiana Genome v1.

item.title: NbALY916
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NbALY916 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Nicotiana benthamiana Functional Descriptions: NbALY916 is involved in potato virus X P25-triggered cell death in Nicotiana benthamiana.

item.title: NbBTF3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NbBTF3 Gene Name: basic transcription factor 3 Genome: Species: Nicotiana benthamiana Functional Descriptions: Silencing of NbBTF3 results in developmental defects and disturbed gene expression in chloroplasts and mitochondria of higher plants.

item.title: NbCML30
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Niben101Scf07608g00007 Gene Symbol: NbCML30 Gene Name: calmodulin-like protein 30 Genome: Species: Nicotiana benthamiana Functional Descriptions: Tobacco mosaic virus hijacks its coat protein-interacting protein IP-L to inhibit NbCML30, a calmodulin-like protein, to enhance its infection.

item.title: NbCMT3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NbCMT3 Gene Name: chromomethylase protein 3 Genome: Species: Nicotiana benthamiana Functional Descriptions: Virus-induced gene silencing of NbCMT3/3-2 in N.

item.title: NbCMT3-2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NbCMT3-2 Gene Name: chromomethylase3-2 Genome: Species: Nicotiana benthamiana Functional Descriptions: Developmental- and Tissue-Specific Expression of NbCMT3-2 Encoding a Chromomethylase in Nicotiana benthamiana.

item.title: NbEXPA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: NbS00007680g0013.1 Gene Symbol: NbEXPA1 Gene Name: α-expansin protein Genome: Species: Nicotiana benthamiana Functional Descriptions: NbEXPA1, an α-expansin, is plasmodesmata-specific and a novel host factor for potyviral infection.

item.title: NbGSTU4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NbGSTU4 Gene Name: glutathione transferase4 Genome: Species: Nicotiana benthamiana Functional Descriptions: The glutathione transferase of Nicotiana benthamiana NbGSTU4 plays a role in regulating the early replication of Bamboo mosaic virus.

item.title: NbMYB4L
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Niben101Scf03570Ctg037 Gene Symbol: NbMYB4L Gene Name: Genome: Sol Genomics Network(https://solgenomics.

item.title: NbRabE1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NbRabE1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Nicotiana benthamiana Functional Descriptions: We characterized the gene expression, subcellular localization, and in vivo functions of a Nicotiana benthamiana small GTPase belonging to the RabE family, designated NbRabE1.

item.title: NbRABG3f
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NbRABG3f Gene Name: Rab small GTPase Genome: Species: Nicotiana benthamiana Functional Descriptions: NbRABG3f, a member of Rab GTPase, is involved in Bamboo mosaic virus infection in Nicotiana benthamiana.

item.title: NbRae1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NbRae1 Gene Name: RNA export 1 Genome: Species: Nicotiana benthamiana Functional Descriptions: Virus-induced gene silencing of Nicotiana benthamiana Rae1, NbRae1, which encodes a protein with four WD40 repeats, resulted in growth arrest and abnormal leaf development.

item.title: NbRAF2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NbRAF2 Gene Name: Rubisco assembly factor 2 Genome: Species: Nicotiana benthamiana Functional Descriptions: Rubisco assembly factor 2 (NbRAF2), which localizes in the nucleus, cell periphery, chloroplasts, and stromules.

item.title: NOR-like1
